page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content:
My name is Elun Atkins.I wake up at 7.30am, I read till 8.00am then I have breakfast. For breakfast I have cornflakes or Shredded Wheat.After that I have luncheon meat and sometimes fried bread. After I clean my teeth I get my bag ready and brush my hair.
In my bag for school I have reading book,a sandwich box and a flask.In my sandwich's I have 2 jam and 2 egg or marmarlade and a biscuit.In my flask I have apple juice.
I walk to school.The bell goes to start school at 9.00am then we all go to our class rooms. First we do the register then we have assembly. In assembly we sing a song then we have a story.
